data.text:
Matia Bazar were an Italian pop band that released nine albums on Ariston between 1976 and 1985, followed by a pair of titles on CGD during the late 1980s.

Members: Giancarlo Golzi (vocals, drums, 1975-2015), Piero Cassano (vocals, guitar, keyboards, 1975-81, 2000-15), Aldo Stellita (bass, vocals, 1975-98), Carlo Marrale (guitar, vocals, 1975-93), Antonella Ruggiero (vocals, 1975-89), Mauro Sabbione (keyboards, 1981-84), Sergio Cossu (keyboards, 1985-98), Laura Valente (vocals, 1991-98)

Discography:
